price: 不使他们忧愁最大的恐怖。众天使将欢迎他们（说）：“这是你们曾受应许的日子。”
arabic: لَا يَحۡزُنُهُمُ ٱلۡفَزَعُ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرُ وَتَتَلَقَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ هَٰذَا يَوۡمُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُمۡ تُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yaḥzunuhumu al-fazaʿu al-akbaru watatalaqqāhumu al-malāikatu hādhā yawmukumu alladhī kuntum tūʿadūna
